LanguageData.AlertGenebankUnpoweredDesc:
A gene potion bank does not have fuel, so the genepacks inside it are slowly deteriorating. Add insect jelly to the gene potion bank to prevent gene potions from deteriorating
Once the gene potion bank is fueled. it will slowly reverse the deterioration of the gene potions inside it.
LanguageData.MB_CommandToggleGas_Desc: Designate steam flow to be toggle on or off. A colonist will come soon to flick the switch.
LanguageData.MB_InfiniteDeposit: A small infinite steam deposit has been found!
LanguageData.MB_AutoTakeSoulDesc: This determines whether {PAWN_nameDef} will automatically ingest soul gems when {PAWN_possessive} dark arcana is below {MIN}.\n\nAutomatic ingestion is currently {ONOFF}.
LanguageData.MB_AbilityDisabledNoSoulGene: {0_labelShort} does not have enough dark arcana.
